reviews.review: Игра супер,графика шикоз,мы с друзьями играем каждый день и игра ни разу не подводила...

Voilà désormais 5 ans que je joue à CSGO et je commence à apercevoir un certain nombrлs de changement dans mon vocaвulиire [i] слава россии, блин, беги на б молиться за нашего бога владимир путин наш месси всем [/i]
Best game ever played, like that Valve is listening to the community by fixing hitboxes etc. Very realistic, very competitive and incredibly entertaining! Good job Valve
非常经典的好游戏，中国人都来玩，真的好，没有那么多的RMB玩家。

Its always seems crazy and fantastic to see how deeply i am connected to the gaming world and i started with CS CZ.CS GO is a game that still excite me towards gaming.this is a fantastic game.team coordination and strategies are the main things to win and progress in the game.

Myself, personally. I can't get into a game like this, as full of different things and the variation of things you can do due to other people's servers and such - it's not something I can enjoy myself. I used to play this a lot, before - on another account until I made this one, until now, I've lost interest.

The game does come with some challenging aspects towards having to rank up, if you're a competitive person, you'll love this. It's a CPU-based game, so you could pretty much run this on any old piece of crap!
